attributes.action: Cancel GCSES and A Levels for 2022
attributes.additional_details: For all pupils who entered into the next stage of education being it GCSEs or A Levels there has been distribution from the beginning of September due to most pupils ending up at least going into self isolation once. This has meant that learning has been given in different amounts to different students creating differ learning chances. Alongside this, with schools being forced to go online, the quality of learning will be vastly affected and the range of this quality will be astronomical.
attributes.background: The Government should cancel GCSEs and A Levels in 2022 due to the continued  disruption of Covid-19. Even though schools are being forced to go online, there is a wide range of quality of learning being given either giving unfair advantages or disadvantages to all students

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566760
